query:
-- Sample Travel + Leisure Co. AI Governance Initiatives

-- Initiative 1: AI-Powered Mobile Check-In (Quick Win)
INSERT INTO initiatives (
  userId, userRole, userEmail, area, title, problemStatement, aiApproach, primaryUsers,
  currentWorkflow, proposedWorkflow, bottlenecksAddressed, processOwner, affectedTeams,
  primaryMetric, quantifiedGoal, baselineMeasurement, successCriteria, measurementMethod,
  effortScore, returnScore, riskScore,
  affectedEmployeeCount, projectedImprovement, totalRevenueImpact,
  memberExperienceImpact, brandDifferentiation, operationalExcellence,
  workflowDocumented, outcomesDefined, riskAssessed, privacyReviewed, complianceVerified, stakeholderBuyIn, pilotPlanDefined, governanceChecklistComplete,
  missionSupports, wholPersonCareAlignment, ethicalConcerns,
  missionAlignmentRating, missionAlignmentReasoning,
  mainArea, clinicalImpact, dataType, automationLevel, riskLevel, governancePath, riskReasoning,
  impact, effort, priorityScore, priorityCategory, priorityQuadrant,
  impactScale, impactBenefitType, impactFinancialReturn, impactScore,
  feasibilityComplexity, feasibilityTimeline, feasibilityDependencies, feasibilityScore,
  status, roadmapStatus, evaluatedBy, evaluatedAt, evaluationNotes,
  currentStep, completed, createdAt, updatedAt
) VALUES (
  1, 'Guest Services Director', 'sarah.martinez@travelandleisure.com', 'member-experience',
  'AI-Powered Mobile Check-In System',
  'Current check-in process requires members to wait in lobby queues averaging 15-20 minutes during peak times, creating friction at the start of their vacation experience. Front desk staff spend 80% of time on routine check-in tasks rather than personalized service.',
  'Mobile app with AI-powered identity verification, room preference matching, and digital key delivery. Natural language chatbot handles special requests. Computer vision validates ID documents in <30 seconds.',
  'Resort guests (100% of arrivals), front desk staff (200+ employees across properties), housekeeping coordination teams',
  '1) Guest arrives at resort 2) Waits in lobby queue (15-20 min avg) 3) Front desk manually verifies reservation 4) Staff enters preferences into PMS 5) Physical key card issued 6) Directions provided verbally',
  '1) Guest completes mobile check-in 24hrs before arrival 2) AI verifies identity via photo ID 3) System assigns optimal room based on preferences 4) Digital key activated upon property arrival 5) Personalized welcome message with resort info sent',
  'Eliminates lobby queue bottleneck, reduces front desk workload by 60%, enables contactless arrival, frees staff for high-value guest interactions',
  'VP of Guest Experience', 'Front Desk Operations, Housekeeping, IT, Mobile Development',
  'Average check-in time', 'Reduce from 18 minutes to <3 minutes', '18 minutes (current avg)', 'Sub-3-minute check-in for 80% of mobile users within 90 days', 'PMS timestamp data + mobile app analytics',
  3, 9, 2,
  200, 60, 2400000,
  'Eliminates vacation-start friction, enables immediate resort enjoyment, personalized digital welcome experience',
  'Industry-leading mobile-first experience, positions Travel + Leisure as innovation leader in hospitality tech',
  'Reduces front desk labor costs by $1.2M annually, improves staff allocation to revenue-generating activities',
  1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1,
  '["Member experience excellence", "Operational efficiency", "Employee satisfaction"]',
  'Directly supports "Putting the World on Vacation" by removing friction from vacation start. Enhances member convenience and creates more time for memorable experiences.',
  'Privacy: Biometric data handling requires secure storage. Accessibility: Must provide alternative for guests without smartphones.',
  'High',
  'Aligns perfectly with member experience mission. Reduces operational friction while elevating brand perception. Privacy safeguards required but manageable.',
  'member-experience', 'Direct member-facing experience', 'PII (name, photo ID, payment info)', 'Automated with human escalation path', 'Medium', 'Standard',
  'Medium risk due to PII handling and identity verification. Standard governance appropriate with privacy review and pilot testing.',
  8, 3, 27, 'High Impact', 'quick-win',
  'large', 'experience', 'high', 9,
  'simple', 'quick', 'minor', 8,
  'evaluated', 'in-progress', 'Irvin Cruz', NOW(), 'Clear Quick Win - Low implementation complexity with immediate member experience impact and strong ROI. Recommend fast-track approval.',
  6, 1, DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 14 DAY), DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 2 DAY)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user oYC4Lz5DqbQiGEf.root --database LVN2BBaghCkJZKnQ9H5R4v --execute -- Sample Travel + Leisure Co. AI Governance Initiatives

  1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1,
  '["Member experience excellence", "Operational efficiency", "Employee satisfaction"]',
  'Directly supports "Putting the World on Vacation" by removing friction from vacation start. Enhances member convenience and creates more time for memorable experiences.',
  'Privacy: Biometric data handling requires secure storage. Accessibility: Must provide alternative for guests without smartphones.',

  'Aligns perfectly with member experience mission. Reduces operational friction while elevating brand perception. Privacy safeguards required but manageable.',
  'member-experience', 'Direct member-facing experience', 'PII (name, photo ID, payment info)', 'Automated with human escalation path', 'Medium', 'Standard',

  8, 3, 27, 'High Impact', 'quick-win',
  'large', 'experience', 'high', 9,
  'simple', 'quick', 'minor', 8,
  'evaluated', 'in-progress', 'Irvin Cruz', NOW(), 'Clear Quick Win - Low implementation complexity with immediate member experience impact and strong ROI. Recommend fast-track approval.',
  6, 1, DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 14 DAY), DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 2 DAY)

logs: ERROR 1265 (01000) at line 4: Data truncated for column 'primaryMetric' at row 1
